mapper.insert: INSERT portal_recordlog(userid, recordname, recordtype, recordid, url, recount, modifytime, ipaddress) VALUES(#{userid}, #{recordname}, #{recordtype}, #{recordid}, #{url}, #{recount}, #{modifytime}, #{ipaddress})
mapper.select:
select count(distinct recordid) from portal_recordlog where userid=#{userid} and recordtype='menu'
and recordname like '%${recordname}%'
